data.label: Constellation.js
data.content: Welcome to the feature tour. Click a node to learn more.

data.label: Hover Tooltips
data.tooltip: Additional information about nodes can be displayed in a tooltip.
data.content: Hover over this node to see a tooltip. You can quickly define tooltips using the 'tooltip' data property.

data.label: Node & Edge Styles
data.content:
Nodes and edges support a variety of style properties by default. If that's not enough you can also create your own renderers!

Click the related nodes to see some of the ways that the appearance can be customized.

data.label: Fonts
data.content: Constellation.js draws strings using your browser's SVG so text styling and foreign languages work automatically for enabled languages.

data.label: كل سنة وانت طيب
data.content: That's happy birthday in Arabic. Right-to-left text rendering in action!

data.label: おたんじょびおめでとう
Shapes
data.content: Several shapes are supported and each can be sized using the 'graphicSize' style property.

data.label: Label Position
data.content: Change the label position relative to the node graphic by simply specifying 'left', 'right', 'top', 'bottom', or 'center'.

data.label: Edge Styles
data.content: Edge color and thickness can be changed and arrowheads can be displayed on one or both sides.

data.label: Icons
data.content: Icons can be added beside the label as additional indicators.

data.label: Deep Linking
data.content:
When Constellation.js is setup with deep-linking, users can click the back button to return to previously navigated nodes. You can also link directly to other parts of the graph:

  • Shapes
  • Icons
  • Fonts

data.label: Cascading Styles
data.content:
Nodes can be styled individually at the data level or they can be assigned style classes and have their appearance changed as a group. Same goes for styling edges.

You can also update styles and style classes after load; in this example, node styles change when they're selected and when they've been visited.

data.label: Multitouch
data.content:
An intuitive tactile experience allowing you to drag nodes around and drag, pinch-zoom, and rotate the canvas.

You can even hold a node under your thumb while you manipulate the rest of the nodes using the background.

Try it out!
